errors.emojiError: I need the `[externalEmojis]` permission in order for me to operate. Please, request that an admin activates it so that I can work :)
errors.linkError: I need the `[sendLinks]` permission in order for me to operate. Please, request that an admin activates it so that I can work :)
errors.dmError: Sorry, but I can't send direct messages yet :(
errors.commandNotFound: Oops, I couldn't find the command `[command]`. Did you mean something like `[alt]`?

mention.title: Who´s calling me?
mention.line1: Oh, hello [username], how are you? My name is [me].
mention.line2: Well, if you wanna know my job, it is to help your server in many creative and different ways!
mention.line3: Maybe you don't know my prefix on this server and that's why you pinged me. If that´s your question, it´s `[prefix]`.
mention.line4: If you have any suggestions or found any loose ends, join my [support server]([url]) to talk with my creator.
mention.line5: If you wanna add me to your server, just click [aqui]([url])!
mention.line6: And finally, thanks for messaging me. It was great to explain who I am <3

newLevel.title: Novo Nível!
newLevel.description: Parabéns [user], agora você está no Nível **[level]**!

status.7: Sabia que sou OpenSource? Não? Então use o comando "git" e ajude meu criador a me deixar melhor ;)

ready.maintenance: 🚫AVISO: MANUTENÇÃO PROGRAMADA PARA [date]! FICAREI INDISPONÍVEL POR [time]!🚫
